trans-unit.source: Set Up Service Offerings | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Service Offerings | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set up the services that you offer to your customers.

seg-source.mrk: Learn how to set up the services that you offer to your customers.

target.mrk: Naučte se, jak nastavit servis, který nabízíte svým zákazníkům.

trans-unit.source: When you set up service management, you must decide what services to offer customers and the schedule for those services.

seg-source.mrk: When you set up service management, you must decide what services to offer customers and the schedule for those services.

target.mrk: Při nastavování správy servisu se musíte rozhodnout, jaký servis nabídnout zákazníkům a plán tohoto servisu

trans-unit.source: A service is a type of work performed by one or more resources and provided to a customer.

seg-source.mrk: A service is a type of work performed by one or more resources and provided to a customer.

target.mrk: Servis je druh práce prováděné jedním nebo více zdroji a poskytované zákazníkovi.

trans-unit.source: For example, a service could be a type of computer repair.

seg-source.mrk: For example, a service could be a type of computer repair.

target.mrk: Například servisem může být typ opravy počítače.

trans-unit.source: A service item is the equipment or item that needs servicing, for example, the computer that needs repair, installed at a specific customer.

seg-source.mrk: A service item is the equipment or item that needs servicing, for example, the computer that needs repair, installed at a specific customer.

target.mrk: Předmět servisu je zařízení nebo zboží, které potřebuje servis, například počítač, který potřebuje opravu, nainstalován u konkrétního zákazníka.

trans-unit.source: You can set up services as part of a group of related repair or maineenance items.

seg-source.mrk: You can set up services as part of a group of related repair or maineenance items.

target.mrk: Servis můžete nastavit jako součást skupiny souvisejícího zboží opravy nebo údržby.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes a sequence of tasks, with links to the topics that describe them.

seg-source.mrk: The following table describes a sequence of tasks, with links to the topics that describe them.

target.mrk: Následující tabulka popisuje sekvenci úloh s odkazy na témata, které je popisují.

trans-unit.source: Enter information about the service items that your service organization is tracking.

seg-source.mrk: Enter information about the service items that your service organization is tracking.

target.mrk: Zadejte informace o předmětech servisu, které vaše servisní organizace sleduje.

trans-unit.source: Establish a workflow for service when the service items consists of several components.

seg-source.mrk: Establish a workflow for service when the service items consists of several components.

target.mrk: Vytvořte pracovní postup pro servis, když předměty servisu sestávají z několika součástí.

trans-unit.source: The component list is always connected to a service item, but these components can also be based on bill of materials (BOMs).

seg-source.mrk: The component list is always connected to a service item, but these components can also be based on bill of materials (BOMs).

target.mrk: Seznam komponent je vždy spojen s předmětem servisu, ale tyto komponenty mohou být také založeny na kusovníku.

trans-unit.source: [Set Up Service Items and Service Item Components](service-how-setup-service-items.md)

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Service Items and Service Item Components

target.mrk: Nastavení Předmětů servisu a Komponent předmětu servisu
